title: Can't play if Cheat Engine is installed on your computer.
body: Vandiril discovered some time ago that if any of your opened windows' title contained "cheat engine" the game would automatically crash (intended crash, not a bugsplat), but now it also crashes if you have installed cheat engine on your computer (started on 9.10, but now 100% of the time, and now on 9.11 it always crashes).
